title: [1.12.2-1.10.2][In Game Info XML Addon - Tough As Nails]用xml显示坚定意志的信息
author: psk2001
txt_content:
本帖最后由 psk2001 于 2018-10-7 14:33 编辑 

Mod简介：
当你玩 tough as nails 时用着 ingameinfoxml ，是不是时常为 ingameinfoxml 无法显示 tough as nails 的信息而苦恼呢，这个模组可以帮你在 ingameinfoxml 中显示 tough as nails的信息。
一张一看就懂mod的图





QQ截图20181007123236.png (10.34 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2018-10-7 12:34 上传





可以看出 这个mod给 ingameinfoxml 添加了体温和季节的显示
体温栏：左侧是当前体温 右侧是体温的移动方向
季节栏：顾名思义

下面给出代码（转自作者并少量修改）

<line>
<str>体温: $e{tancurrtemp}/25--->{tantargettemp}/25$f</str>
</line>
<line>
<str>季节: $e{tanseason}$f</str>
</line>复制代码


作者写的简介（英文未翻译）

Adds tags for Tough As Nails to InGame Info XML.
Tags added:
tancurrtemp - Returns the player's current temperature
tantargettemp - Returns the temperature the player is currently trending to (capped at 0 and 25)
tanseason - Returns the current sub-season (i.e. Early Spring, Mid Summer, Late Autumn) (as of 1.3, this tag needs Serene Seasons installed since that functionality was moved out of Tough As Nails)
Note: This does not add anything to the default configuration. These must be added to the XML (or JSON) file.


下载地址


原贴地址（尊重作者，curseforge未被墙）1.12.2 1.11.2 1.10.2
